term.title: fuel reprocessing (nuclear)

item.text: The processing of nuclear fuel, after its use in a reactor, to remove fission products and recover fissile and fertile material.

item.title: fertile (of a @N04257@, of a material) (of a @N04257@, of a material, in radioanalytical chemistry)
